resources.string:
Test voice commands : 
 1. Take picture (EN), tomar la foto (ES) 
 2. Toggle camera (EN), alternar cámara (ES) 
 3. Set zoom to $(number b/w 0 and 100) (EN), 
 establece el zoom en $(número entre uno y cien) (ES)
Make sure the voice UI foreground service is started before using the voice commands.
